comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the additional information. We'll add it to the source data and reload the description in Flickr to match.

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: The Cyber Boxing Zone link above is good, but the Wikipedia link is to an article about a football player born in 1922. Boxer Bobby Dobbs doesn't yet have a Wikipedia page. The note suggesting that the "Holger Hausen" in the photo is actually Holger Hansen is surely correct- another Bain caption error. Here is the BoxRec bout list page for Danish boxer Holger Hansen, including his July 10, 1910 fight with Bobby Dobbs in Copenhagen.

comment.author: 60716841@N00
comment._content: Why on earth does this come up in a search of The Commons for "cartersville georgia"?  Neither word is on the page.  Hmm...

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Hi calamity jane doe, Cartersville, Georgia is listed in the notes that another Flikr user has put on this photo. If you go up to the photo and place your mouse over the box around Bobby Dobbs' face, it lists his possible birthplace as Cartersville, Georga, as well as some other information.

comment.author: 60716841@N00
comment._content: Ah-HA!  Thanks for the explanation, Jon.
